TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSignificantWhitespace extends System.Xml.XmlCharacterData

Docs.summary: Represents white space between markup in a mixed content node or white space within an xml:space= 'preserve' scope. This is also referred to as significant white space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string strData, class System.Xml.XmlDocument doc) cil managed

Docs.param: The white space characters of the node.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode CloneNode(bool deep) cil managed

Docs.param: to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; to clone only the node itself. For significant white space nodes, the cloned node always includes the data value, regardless of the parameter setting.
Docs.summary: Creates a duplicate of this node.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `CloneNode` serves as a copy constructor for nodes. To see how this method behaves with other node types, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The cloned node has no parent. <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`.

Docs.summary: Gets the local name of the node.
Gets the qualified name of the node.
Gets the type of the current node.
Docs.value: For nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.SignificantWhitespace.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example adds significant white space to the document.
[!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSignificantWhitespace.NodeType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.xmlsignific_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlSignificantWhitespace.NodeType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.xmlsignific_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSignificantWhitespace.NodeType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.xmlsignific_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the parent of the current node.
Docs.value: The parent node of the current node.

Docs.summary: Gets the text node that immediately precedes this node.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Value { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of the node.
Docs.value: The white space characters found in the node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When setting this property, valid white space characters must be specified. White space can consist of one or more space characters, carriage returns, line feeds, or tabs.

Docs.exception: Setting to invalid white space characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteContentTo(class System.Xml.XmlWriter w) cil managed

Docs.param: The to which you want to save.
Docs.summary: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteTo(class System.Xml.XmlWriter w) cil managed

Docs.param: The to which you want to save.
Docs.summary: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
